import React,{useState} from "react"; import './booking.css'; import { Form, FormGroup,ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from "reactstrap"; const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour; const [credentials, setCredentials ] = useState({ userId: '1' , userEmail:'perera@gmail.com', fullname:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value })) }; const handClick = e=> e.preventD return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/*==========booking form*/}
Information
{/*==========booking form end */} {/*==========booking bottom */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
$10
Total
$109
{/*==========booking bottom end */}
); }; export default Booking
